paper_abstract: This correspondence points out an incorrect statement in Adetona et al., 2000, and Adetona et at., 2004, about the application of the proposed control law to nonminimum phase systems. A counterexample shows the limitations of the control law and, furthermore, its control capability to nonminimum phase systems is explained.
paper_title: On the new method for the control of discrete nonlinear dynamic systems using neural networks
